Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y cells transfected with DJ-1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced DJ-1 protein levels observed in p.G93A variant.
Moderate reduction in DJ-1 protein levels observed in p.A133T variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 plasmid used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfection used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: DJ-1 protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: DJ-1 protein expression less than 50% of wild-type.

Material used.Description: Cell viability was assessed using SH-SY5Y cells expressing DJ-1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased sensitivity to MPP+ toxicity observed in p.G93A variant.
Moderate increase in sensitivity to MPP+ toxicity observed in p.A133T variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 transfection used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated SH-SY5Y cells used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% of control.
